enum: The degree to which legal frameworks promote, enforce and monitor gender equality in public life, on a 0-100 scale
The degree to which legal frameworks promote, enforce and monitor gender equality with respect to violence against women, on a 0-100 scale.
The degree to which legal frameworks promote, enforce and monitor gender equality with respect to employment and economic benefits, on a 0-100 scale.
The degree to which legal frameworks promote, enforce and monitor gender equality with respect to marriage and family benefits, on a 0-100 scale.

title: Whether or not legal frameworks are in place to promote, enforce and monitor equality and non‑discrimination on the basis of sex
